document.full_text: syrian security forces fired on protesters in the cities of latakia and dara'a on saturday, a day after the bloodiest and largest antigovernment protests since the uprising began.
document.title: syrian forces open fire on demonstrators in two cities
lines_and_colors: syrian security forces fired on protesters in the cities of latakia and dara'a on saturday, a day after the bloodiest and largest antigovernment protests since the uprising began.
